segments.text: No , I haven't . What's going on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you hear about last night's blackout ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . The lights were out all night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some people went looting because of the blackout .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People decided to use the blackout to their advantage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess they broke into about four stores .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did the police find who did it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's no evidence of who it was .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope we don't have any more blackouts .
segments.speaker: S2
